text: "We must keep America first in our hearts.  We must keep freedom alive in our souls.  And we must always keep faith in America's destiny -- that one Nation, under God, must be the hope and the promise and the light and the glory among all the nations of the world!" #SOTU

html: "We must never ignore the vile poison of anti-Semitism, or those who spread its venomous creed. With one voice, we must confront this hatred anywhere and everywhere it occurs." #SOTU
text: "We must never ignore the vile poison of anti-Semitism, or those who spread its venomous creed.  With one voice, we must confront this hatred anywhere and everywhere it occurs." #SOTU

html: "Above all, friend and foe alike must never doubt this Nation's power and will to defend our people." #SOTU
text: "Above all, friend and foe alike must never doubt this Nation's power and will to defend our people." #SOTU

html: "My Administration recognized the true capital of Israel -- and proudly opened the American Embassy in Jerusalem." #SOTU
text: "My Administration recognized the true capital of Israel -- and proudly opened the American Embassy in Jerusalem." #SOTU

html: "America was founded on liberty and independence –- not government coercion, domination, and control. We are born free, and we will stay free." #SOTU
text: "America was founded on liberty and independence –- not government coercion, domination, and control.  We are born free, and we will stay free." #SOTU

html: "Let us work together to build a culture that cherishes innocent life. And let us reaffirm a fundamental truth: all children -- born and unborn -- are made in the holy image of God." #SOTU #ProLife
text: "Let us work together to build a culture that cherishes innocent life.  And let us reaffirm a fundamental truth:  all children -- born and unborn -- are made in the holy image of God." #SOTU #ProLife

html: "There could be no greater contrast to the beautiful image of a mother holding her infant child than the chilling displays our Nation saw in recent days." #SOTU #ProLife
text: "There could be no greater contrast to the beautiful image of a mother holding her infant child than the chilling displays our Nation saw in recent days." #SOTU #ProLife

html: "Both parties should be able to unite for a great rebuilding of America's crumbling infrastructure." #SOTU
text: "Both parties should be able to unite for a great rebuilding of America's crumbling infrastructure." #SOTU

html: "Simply put, walls work and walls save lives. So let's work together, compromise, and reach a deal that will truly make America safe." #SOTU
text: "Simply put, walls work and walls save lives.  So let's work together, compromise, and reach a deal that will truly make America safe." #SOTU

html: "Tens of thousands of innocent Americans are killed by lethal drugs that cross our border and flood into our cities -- including meth, heroin, cocaine, and fentanyl." #SOTU
text: "Tens of thousands of innocent Americans are killed by lethal drugs that cross our border and flood into our cities -- including meth, heroin, cocaine, and fentanyl." #SOTU

html: USA! USA! USA! #SOTU
text: USA! USA! USA! #SOTU

html: "My Administration has cut more regulations in a short time than any other administration during its entire tenure. Companies are coming back to our country in large numbers thanks to historic reductions in taxes and regulations." #SOTU #Jobs #choosegreatness
text: "My Administration has cut more regulations in a short time than any other administration during its entire tenure.  Companies are coming back to our country in large numbers thanks to historic reductions in taxes and regulations." #SOTU #Jobs #choosegreatness

html: "We passed a massive tax cut for working families and doubled the child tax credit. We virtually ended the estate, or death, tax on small businesses, ranches, and family farms." #SOTU #choosegreatness
text:
"We passed a massive tax cut for working families and doubled the child tax credit.

We virtually ended the estate, or death, tax on small businesses, ranches, and family farms." #SOTU #choosegreatness

html: "Nearly 5 million Americans have been lifted off food stamps." #SOTU
text: "Nearly 5 million Americans have been lifted off food stamps." #SOTU

html: "We have created 5.3 million new jobs and importantly added 600,000 new manufacturing jobs -- something which almost everyone said was impossible to do, but the fact is, we are just getting started." #SOTU #choosegreatness
text: "We have created 5.3 million new jobs and importantly added 600,000 new manufacturing jobs -- something which almost everyone said was impossible to do, but the fact is, we are just getting started." #SOTU #choosegreatness

html: But we must reject the politics of revenge, resistance, and retribution -- and embrace the boundless potential of cooperation, compromise, and the common good. #SOTU
text: But we must reject the politics of revenge, resistance, and retribution -- and embrace the boundless potential of cooperation, compromise, and the common good. #SOTU
